July 12 - 15, 2025 Atlanta, Georgia Claim Tickets Bag Policy Bags are NOT ALLOWED to enter Truist Park and Capital One All-Star Village. Exceptions may be made for: Medical bags no larger than what is required to transport necessary medical equipment Breast pumps for nursing mothers and other bags required for guests with ADA needs Diaper bags for guests accompanied by infant(s) and/or toddler(s) Small, single compartment clutches no larger than 5 x 9 inches Please see the Braves Outside Food & Drink Policy . A mobile locker, Binbox, is available for guests needing to store their oversized bags before entering Truist Park. The lockers are rented on a first come, first served basis and are located outside of the First Base Gate. Rental lockers will be available beginning approximately two hours prior to game time until one hour after last out.
